snippet: Readers respond to recent essays about William S. Burroughs and reviews of “Abraham Joshua Heschel: The Call of Transcendence” and George F. Kennan’s diaries.
lead_paragraph: Readers respond to recent essays about William S. Burroughs and reviews of “Abraham Joshua Heschel: The Call of Transcendence” and George F. Kennan’s diaries.

headline.main: Letters: Bad Boys, Heschel and Kennan’s Diaries
